meanings.definition: A person who throws or pitches a baseball with great speed and power.
meanings.sent1: The fireballers on the team always impress the crowd with their fast pitches.
meanings.sent2: The coach recruited new fireballers to strengthen the pitching lineup.
meanings.sent3: The fireballers decided to have a speed contest to see who could throw the fastest pitch.
meanings.sent4: The fireballers were like human cannons, launching baseballs at incredible speeds.
meanings.sent5: The fireballers' pitches blazed through the air like shooting stars.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals known for their exceptional ability to throw a baseball at high velocities.
meanings.sent1: Fans cheered loudly for the talented fireballers on the team.
meanings.sent2: The fireballers practiced together to improve their pitching skills.
meanings.sent3: The fireballers were so good, they could probably hit a target from miles away.
meanings.sent4: The fireballers' throws cut through the air like lightning bolts.
meanings.sent5: The fireballers' pitches were like rockets launching into space.
